@publicaddress @JulieAnneGenter @jacindaardern @scoutriver You might have a third door knocker soon. I'd hide any cats you have, though.
@StephenStra @ZippyGonzales Yep, and those who bought it can better grow the business in new markets.
@ZippyGonzales Short of nationalisation, you can't. And we don't live in that sort of world any more, which is, on balance, a good thing.
@fastercamels John Key's at a bit of a loose end. He'd be good.
@LewSOS @_hehir_ Field promotion/wartime commission. You'll be busted back to the ranks at the end of hostilities.

https://t.co/F9yYEQEmLI 'Labour and the Greens declared themselves in favour of nice things, and firmly against not-nice things. [paid]
@felixmarwick @CTrevettNZH @isaac_davison @jmodoh You've changed, man.
@gtiso @ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ I have *never* belittled the gravity of Trump's order. Never would, either.
@BenThomasNZ @LewSOS Ah, but they're the real right, according to @ShakingStick
@gtiso @ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ 2/2..response like NZ had agreed to Trump annexing the Sudentenland or something? I'll stand by that.
@gtiso @ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ as a description of folk demanding an instant tweet from the PM and treating waiting for a considered..1/2
@gtiso @ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ I'd settle for people reading what I wrote, not what they wish I'd written.
@ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ ... and, mostly, I only know what's on 'em when you post about 'em here.
@ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ Riiight. So you want me to monitor KiwiBlog & WO & say where I think they're wrong. Awesome use of my time.
@ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ @LewSOS Well, you've been getting a woodie for a Kiwi Trump for at least 6 months. Don't think it'll happen tho
@ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ 'Cos its served the left so well, you mean?
@LewSOS @AndreAlessi @ShakingStick I said he was right to make a measured not a rushed response, & took a swing at the spasming on Twitter.
@ShakingStick @BenThomasNZ @LewSOS @AndreAlessi Why bother? Only readers are a few drooling meatheads & Lefties wanting to feel virtuous
@LewSOS @AndreAlessi @ShakingStick ..2/2.. there's been some extraordinary bad faith misinterpretation gone on.
@LewSOS @AndreAlessi @ShakingStick No, just here, for now anyway. But I haven't 'praised' anyone, not have I said they should say nothing.
@LewSOS @AndreAlessi @ShakingStick I didn't do that, if you actually have a look.
@LewSOS @AndreAlessi @ShakingStick different to what?
@AndreAlessi @ShakingStick After all the talk about values yesterday, I'm sure Labour & the Greens will be rushing to condemn this.
@pptsapper And a genius. And wisdom & genius seldom reside in the same cranium.
@MattNippert @realDonaldTrump I figured Clint Eastwood.
